storyInfo: Manfred's plan to use the airship as bait to destroy the dukes' main forces goes bust. Ines jumps off the ship, only to be saved by W and Hoederer, and the three reunite. The Damazti Cluster finds Amiya.

attributes.content: Did old Wellington send his entire reserve fleet here?
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: Yes, Your Grace.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: The Duke of Wellington seems to be fighting that ship... he must be sure of his victory.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: Their frontline forces must have already exchanged fire with the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: Grr, and there's still Caster...
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: That woman has barely ever stepped outside her demesne, but even she's not staying put this time.
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: Just how valuable is this ship to be worth all their trouble?
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: Your Grace, the strategists are also recommending we obtain as much technology as we can from that airship.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: Whether we stand against the Sarkaz, or... other possible rivals, such an unprecedented weapon will allow us to control an even larger airspace.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: Shut them up. What 'possible opponents'? They're inciting me to break up Victoria.
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: I came here solely to bring Delphine home.
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: They're also saying that Norport Borough may be in terrible shape right now.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: Delphine will be fine. She's my daughter after all.
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: Y-Your Grace...
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Haven't I said before that running inside the ship is forbidden?
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: Please, take a look at the shadow of that moving plate...
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Something's... not quite right...
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Duke Windermere takes the telescope offered by the adjutant.
The shadow of the mobile plate cast by the morning sun does not resemble Norport Borough.
Is this because of the structure blocking it? Windermere thinks it strangely resembles a tower.
A tower?
Or... A Shard?
Is that... The Shard's shadow?
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: How can this be? Is this a natural phenomenon? Or...?
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: How long did you say it would take for Caster's and Wellington's troops to arrive?
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: Perhaps within the next two hours?
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: A rare event indeed, for the troops of three dukes to all coincidentally converge near this area...
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: According to reports we received earlier, a few other dukes are also planning their moves, so it would not be too surprising to see their warships on the move here.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: I've been in the army for many years, and yet this is the first time I've seen something like this.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: Full stop! All units, stop immediately!
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: Get all of them clear of the area at once!
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: Send a red flare to warn our allies!
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: Quickly! Now!
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: Send a plaintext to every Victorian unit in the region!
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: This place could well be the target of The Shard's attack!
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: A-Alright!
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: Don't turn the ship, speed it up towards Norport Borough!
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: I have to find Delphine before the storm comes!
attributes.name: Duke of Windermere

attributes.content: Red flares blossom under the clouds, and the distorted shadows return to their original state.
Impressive work, Ines.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: It was going to be a simple test shot, not at our full power, but we have many other locations to choose for next time.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: I do have to admit I have some tiny regrets.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: But the Military Commission always has more than just a single plan.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Inform the Nachzehrer King, it's time to rouse the troops.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: The storm will open a path for him.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Ines often says death is also a tool.
She would sometimes joke to Hoederer that she might be getting a little too used to playing dead.
But now, as she stands on death's door, Ines realizes that she feels calmer than she expected.
She closes her eyes.
A blaze abruptly bakes her face, along with an intense shockwave.
The unique smell of the explosives is well familiar to Ines.
Her lips curl up.
Dust and smoke from the explosion engulfs her with embers still retaining the heat of the flames.
These embers gather, dance, and weave together.
Sarkaz history is woven of embers, but occasionally, other things are knitted from the smoldering remains.
For example...
Ines falls head first into a cushiony cloud of smoke and dust.
A giant web of embers holds her aloft.
I never should've expected... that the two of them could come up with anything better.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Hey, Ines. Still alive and kicking?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: That explosion was pretty tough, so don't blame me if any minor issues crop up.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Ah man, Hoederer. Let's just bury her.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Sorry to rain on your parade, but I'm still alive for now.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Ugh. Killjoy.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: So, did you like the fireworks I set off for you?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: And guess what I secretly sewed into your clothes?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Wow! Who would've guessed? A tracking device!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Do you think I never noticed it?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Shoddy stitching, your darning skills are honestly embarrassing.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Grr. That was supposed to be a present for you, but well, I guess this way's fine too.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: And these—
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Don't you know how difficult it is to keep clothes clean and tidy on a battlefield?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: And you still threw me into a ball of smoldering ashes?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: You used to call my Arts embers.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Not in the mood for that now.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: You're pretty seriously injured.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Better than being dead.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: What?! Hoederer! You had Arts to cast all along? I thought you only knew how to chop at guys with your knife!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Embers? No wonder you're so unfazed whenever I throw a bomb at your face!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: So, are you not afraid of getting shot?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I am.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Can you fling ashes at someone else's face?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Is your permanently haggard scowl a side effect of your Arts?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Shut up.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: ...Heh.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: How many years has it been since I've seen you in such a pathetic state, Ines?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Believe me, you'll never see me like this again.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Don't be too confident now, we might just bump into the Sanguinarch having a leisurely stroll on our way back.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: W, can I ask you to swap your little hypothetical there?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: What, did you develop feelings for those crusty old monsters of the Royal Court after hanging out with Manfred for so long?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Hey, you should be thanking me! If I didn't bump into you scuttling around on my way back, you might've gotten recaptured by your old besties!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Maybe I'll head back to prison so I can at least enjoy some peace and quiet without you.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Be my guest, I'll even do you a solid and report you to Theresis.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Where are we headed?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: W's safehouse.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Fine, I can force myself to pretend we're going home.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: And also—
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: ...Thanks.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: ...I wanna go back.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: What's taking her so long today? She injure her leg or something?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: We gotta help her out, she'll be so grateful that we're bound to get a few bottles of decent beer out of it.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: What'cha standing around for? Let's move!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Enough, Hannah! Norport's a sea of flames right now!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Baird's not dumb, she can keep herself safe.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: She's dead.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: What're you on about? Morgan, this is no time for a laugh—
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: I said! Baird's dead!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Didn't you see that butterfly knife? It was covered in blood!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Baird always kept that on her person, there's no mistaking it...
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: That knife, in someone else's hand, only means one thing...
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: I mean, it might be just a misunderstanding. Maybe she lost her knife or something.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: She's got her careless moments too, right? Not like she never lost nuffin before.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Remember that one year when she accidentally lost our carton of eggs? We were supposed to have fried eggs that morning.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Sometimes she slips up, no big deal...
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Hannah... McClaren is holding her knife.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Baird went back just to look for him.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: He's deaf in both ears, so they probably...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Hah! They've been friends for years. You trying to scare me?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Baird probably just lent her knife to McClaren for a bit, nuffin wrong with that, right?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: I... I'll go ask him. He can tell us, it was just a...
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Hannah.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Where's he? McClaren left Norport along with us, right? So he's definitely in the crowd.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: We'll just ask him, this oughta be a misunderstanding...
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: McClaren—Where are you—
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: McCla—
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Hannah, he can't hear you.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I—
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: I'll kill the bugger! He's dead! When I find him, I'll smash every single bone in his body!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Hannah! That's enough.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Vina! Did you already know about this? Bloody hell, why haven't you—
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Why haven't I gone and smashed his skull in for Baird?! You think I don't want to?!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You think I don't want to?!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Because there's no meaning to it! Rubbing out a frightened deaf man makes no bloody sense at all!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Hannah, I hate it, I hate all of this, I'm a fool through and through, a self-righteous twit!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Allerdale, Baird...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: If I hadn't involved myself in this, they wouldn't have...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: What did I even come back for?!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: What did I even think I came back for?!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Was this... a mistake from the very beginning, born of a false sense of responsibility?
How does she really see them, her friends whom she went through thick and thin and all kinds of hardships with?
Could it be... that this 'friendship' she cherishes so deeply, was actually just an excuse to deceive even herself?
Could it be, that she of all people, has gradually come to see herself as a king?
Grant mercy, sow benevolence... and then, harvest hope and reverence.
What exactly... did she want to achieve here?
What exactly did she expect to achieve here?
Vina, we came back because we couldn't stand it... we were just watching from the side.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Because this is our street, our turf, our country.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: You're always charging ahead, but this isn't your responsibility.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: We're not following you to see what kind of person you'll become.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Vina, you're just our Vina, right?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I'm just Vina. This I swear.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Where should we bring these people from Norport Borough? We can't let them fend for themselves in the wilderness, right?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Besides, this is the heart of the battle.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: These townspeople can live on my mother's land, if they're willing to move.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Mother has a nomadic city in the vicinity of Londinium. It's a rather tiny fortress city, but it'll be no problem to accommodate them.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Got any other ideas, Cador?
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: You know, Delphine? Ever since you stopped hiding your identity, you've changed the way you speak.
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: I know what happened with Baird... has upset you.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: It upset us all, but right now, there's no need to dampen our spirits even more.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: I just...
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Ah, finally found you.
Could we please have some water to drink?
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: That Draco... we don't like those flames of hers, so difficult to extinguish.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Damazti.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Ascalon... It's been a while, hmm?
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: What did you come here for?
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: We're thirsty.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: And to offer a greeting to the little King of Sarkaz here.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: That banshee speaks pretty highly of you.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: It's alright, Doctor. I've never seen our guest here in their current form, but... I know them very well, they've appeared frequently in those histories.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But they're always wandering outside the Royal Court, and they're not interested in anything... except themselves.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Damazti fragment, why have you appeared before us?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So you really are a genuine King of Sarkaz, little bunny.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: That thing seems to have also tormented you quite a bit. Good job holding all that in your little head while not being a Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Memory is the most precious thing to us, but it can sometimes also be our poison.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: So you see, we do appear to have something to talk about.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Are you... also of the opinion that I'm not worthy of bearing the crown of 'The King of Sarkaz'?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I see that talkative revenant really put you through the wringer.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Don't mind it, he's never been the kindly type.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: You're an ancient Sarkaz, so how do you think... a King should act?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oh, good question. We've never been one, and we don't care to bother...
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: But we're thinking, you should at the very least be strong enough?
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Strong enough to... overcome any hesitation or doubt, yes?
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Oh, we're certain of something else though. You definitely shouldn't be asking us this question, little King.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: You have a long path ahead of you, regardless of whether you're leading the organization you call Rhodes Island or following the guidance of the Sarkaz souls.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Oh, sorry. We forgot that the souls won't accept you, just like how they won't accept us.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: We're all different from each other.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: However—
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: You'll understand at some point in the future, that the passage of time is unbeatable. The Kings of Sarkaz in our memories, all walked the very same path in the end.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Not me.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I—refuse to walk that path.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Don't be too quick to refute us, Cautus. We did think it was a nice change having a young King of Sarkaz, but it seems like you're still chained to your fate.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Though we're nonetheless full of expectations for you, a non-Sarkaz King...
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: A young King of Sarkaz who is still growing and questioning her own blood...
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: A never before seen King of Sarkaz...
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: What are you up to?
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: We... have no ill intentions.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: King of Sarkaz, we don't dare to claim that we're wiser than you are, and we have nothing to teach you either.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: We only wish to extend an invitation, we seek an opportunity to thoroughly understand a 'unique' individual.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Ascalon, you will understand when you've lived as long as we have.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: When something you've never seen before appears right before your eyes, how could you resist reaching out to it?
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: O King of Sarkaz, please grant our perennial lives a pleasant surprise.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster
